nodes.text: Tanus Spijek was an Elom from the planet of the same name. He was a former spy for the Rebel Alliance.

He was hired by the Rebels to carry messages between Alderaan and the Rebel base on Yavin 4. After the destruction of Alderaan, Spijek found work in Jabba's Palace as an informant for Jabba the Hutt, aiding him in his bets on the status of the war.
He was on board Jabba's sail barge on the day at the Great Pit of Carkoon when Jabba perished during the rescue of Han Solo.
A Tanus Spijek action figure was released in 2004 by Hasbro as part of the Attack of the Clones/Saga line. "Tanus Spijek" is an anagram of Justin Pakes, a Decipher employee.
